meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Claire Dujardin Mark Dunn Jim Ryan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #614.

td.p: Claire Dujardin, a bookkeeper from Myakka City, Florida
Mark Dunn, an eligibility worker from Sherman Oaks, California
Jim Ryan, a writer from Alexandria, Virginia (whose 3-day cash winnings total $21,950)

tr.td: HISTORY
WEIGHTS & MEASURES
RELATIVES IN SONG
THE PACIFIC NORTHWEST
THE VATICAN
DID YOU NOTICE?
(Alex: And if you are observant, you will have noticed that last week we had Did You Notice? as a category. Perhaps we'll wind up with Andy Rooney as a contestant on our show.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Claire: What is the year of the Earth?)

1492

JimClaire
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Aptly, the 1st known terrestrial globe was constructed in this historic year')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

JimMarkClaire
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Jim
Mark
Claire
SCIENCE
'50'S TV
INTERNATIONAL LAW
LITERATURE
HOMOPHONIC PAIRS
(Alex: Claire, a brief word of explanation on that Homophonic Pairs. There will be two words in the response. They mean different things but they will be pronounced exactly the same way.)
BOND... JAMES BOND

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
